Name: Metal Assault
About the game: It`s finally here! The first episode of Metal Assault! The most hardcore thrilling VR shooter action presented in CES with HTC and PPGUN is finally coming to Steam. Intensive 30 minutes of the real arcade style shooter experience, dodging bullets, hitting explosive barrels, riding crane and fighting against all kinds of vicious enemies to escape the heavily guarded enemy stronghold! Features [1] Bullet time. [2] Realistic combat AI system. [3] Variety of enemies. [4] Switching between dual wielding and precise aiming modes.
